website_summaries.verdict: An attractive basket with some unique items that help create a relaxing at-home spa experience. However, if you are looking for a large, elaborate presentation, check out others on our list.
pros: Features items that are ideal for adding massaging relaxation to bathtime, including a loofah, wooden massage brush, and wooden reflexology stick
Bath items that come with it are cruelty-free and have a fresh cucumber scent
Includes potpourri, a candle, and a well-made wooden basket
cons: Smaller in person than it appears online
Packaging is nothing special - some customers re-wrapped it before giving it as a gift

customer_reviews.title: Buying as a gift? Definitely send it to you before giving to someone else!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a kind of person that reads reviews so I was already prepared (maybe not) for the size being small and the packaging not well done. For my surprise, the size was even smaller than I was preparing myself and the packaging, well... glue dots on a cheap base. I was buying as a gift, so smart decision to have it ship to me instead of directly for the person. The package looks really that you spend not over $10 for the whole kit. - I didn’t open the bottles, but the candle smells nice! - I don’t really know if it worthy the money, but I’ll try to give a better look to it before giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Lima

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I got my kit yesterday and used it last night. The quality is great and the smell was amazing. Sometimes you have to be careful buying scents online but I will definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this basket. Cheap looking and I wanted this for a gift. Small shower and bath soap and the smell is so faint , barely there. Has a foot reflexology stick and brush for massaging , both are extremely small. Hard to hold in your hands. Overall not worth your purchase
customer_reviews.author: DeborahC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this. It was presented beautifully. I couldn't be more happy. thanks
customer_reviews.author: captain Fat wallet

customer_reviews.title: Pamper Them
customer_reviews.text: Cute set for someone who needs pampering. The wooden brush can be used on the go. No need for extra wrapping paper, it’s ready to gift!
customer_reviews.author: Chilliewil

customer_reviews.title: Nice basket!
customer_reviews.text: Not as large a basket as I had hoped for from the photo but VERY nice items and put together very well. Purchased as a gift and the recipient was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blevins

customer_reviews.title: the  items inside were great!
customer_reviews.text: The products themselves inside are great... but I gave this away as a prize for an event and I had to repackage it to make it look great and they are all stuck together with small glue tabs for shipping I guess so it really made the products look less quality than they are....
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: You can go wrong with anything spa lol very pretty, elegant packaging, everything was in good shape
customer_reviews.author: SunflowerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift to give my daughters for Mothers Day ! They loved it !
customer_reviews.author: Dinanna

customer_reviews.title: Needs more spa itmes not just soaps
customer_reviews.text: Its nice but it's not a lot of "spa" items. It's just soaps and a candle mainly. No bath bombs, face mask, or anything that's makes this anything more than a basic soap basket. They need more variety.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Leigh

customer_reviews.title: It’s a cute gift but when I received the package ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute gift but when I received the package the plastic holding everything together was ripped and the products on the inside was out the basket. So now I have to be creative to re wrap the gift again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s small
customer_reviews.text: A LOT smaller than expected. Planned on giving this to someone as a Christmas gift but may need to now buy an add on. To really get a feel for the size, I placed my lighter next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndi Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The basket fell apart (came unglued) when I took the wrapper off. Brissels were missing from the brush. Product was stuck in nasty styrofoam and the potpourri had no smell. It was cheap and not work the price. DO NOT BUY! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a really nice gift basket BUT when I opened the box
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really nice gift basket BUT when I opened the box..the gift basket was upside down and the plastic wrap was torn so some items were loose in n the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The image and description were misleading. Products and container much smaller than anticipated. Did not meet my needs and I ended up spending more money to put together a reasonable gift.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: wrapped nicely, quality items
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, no damage, wrapped nicely, quality items. This item was purchased as a gift. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Super Tiny.
customer_reviews.text: A hell of a lot smaller than lead to believe.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: My friend likes it
customer_reviews.text: As a Christmas gift,it's prefect. If have some free decorations will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was cheap looking fur the high price so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tracee

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: The wooden carrier was small that I though but it all worked out well
customer_reviews.author: scott schuster

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged gift basket. Only disappointment was it is smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice
customer_reviews.text: Loofah broke first tie Unused it.Smell good makes skin supple
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: What a rip off! Do not pay for this! It’s like 6” big! I could have put a basket together twice this one for the price. Very deceiving!
customer_reviews.author: M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I though it would be. Still nice but still small.
customer_reviews.author: MadisonPCimino

customer_reviews.title: Mother's Day
customer_reviews.text: Great gift to a loved one. My girlfriend was more than pleased. Great gift to anyone who deserves a spa or few hours to themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Quanah Jared Clark

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good gift!
customer_reviews.text: My niece reports that it smelled heavenly when she got it. (I would give 5 stars, but never had a chance to see it myself.
customer_reviews.author: P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this gift and really enjoyed all the different products and features.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: A good mistake
customer_reviews.text: I order this product by mistake, thinking I was just getting the basket. But I was able to use the item that was in the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Nita L.

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the pictures. Excellent gift giving idea as it comes already out together. Pretty seamless!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making me pay for crap.
customer_reviews.text: The basket and all contents are much smaller than the picture. I was going to give my friend this as a gift and it would only make me look cheap, althought the price is way too high. As well one of the two baskets had all the the plastic ripped off. I thought it was ripped off during shipping, but the sender stuffed it in the basket in a ball. Thank you for making me pay for crap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK generic gift basket.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this basket would be more "natural" with the items inside but it was a let down when I looked at all the ingredients. It was fine for a generic gift but the bottom of the basket was foam and that's it. Everything was HARD CORE glued to it, too! I took it out and ripped all the items off the foam and just put it back in the basket. Looked A LOT better.
customer_reviews.author: Brock sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister. She really loves the bowl. The bath items are long used but the wooden bowl is still gorgeous. Just a little oil occasionally to seal the wood grain and it will last forever
customer_reviews.author: Taymon Sampson

customer_reviews.title: The smell was nice. The basket and items were a little smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent set. The smell was nice. The basket and items were a little smaller than we expected. It had to all be repackaged from shipping though.
customer_reviews.author: S Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Came in pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I received this today. It was in pieces. I don't think it is cheesy. It would be very nice if the insert was not shredded to pieces also. I don' t have time to return it. and get a new one. I am not sure what to do,
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift, but a bit over priced
customer_reviews.text: Was a very cute basket, but feel it was a bit over priced for the size and quantity of product received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's SO small...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this thinking it would be a sizable gift for our company holiday party. As you can see in the photo, regular Kleenex box for size comparison, it's SMALL. All 7 items are in there as advertised it's SMALL. It might be a good start for the prize I had in mind but that's about it. Certainly not worth the $30 paid.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Shaner

customer_reviews.title: Split in 1/2
customer_reviews.text: Cheap products. Wooden bowl split in 1/2 after an hour in the sauna. I hoped to use it with a wooden ladle in the sauna, to cool off with water.
customer_reviews.author: HawkerFam

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift but it's TINY. It looks pretty cheap. I could have purchased something with better quality at Marshals
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is Smaller than a $5 gift basket at walmart
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice presentation & feels like good quality. Bought as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lori P

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Horrible purchase. I am very disappointed. They pack the basket with Styrofoam and everything is so small a child could barely use it. DO NOT BUY. One of the containers is leaky but the shipping box is fine. Incredible waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Dice basket of goodies. The bowl is the best part.
customer_reviews.author: Blazerboy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift but I'm sure she liked it
customer_reviews.author: LynnNJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it comes in a nice basket but cost was a bit high
customer_reviews.author: momma

customer_reviews.title: this is a perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: love this it was soo cute perfect for a gift or for your self
customer_reviews.author: Gina Stella

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: In the picture it looks like a full basket. Not so much when you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product was good and delivered promptly. As it was a gift, the option of sending it with a gift message was important but unfortunately not available.
customer_reviews.author: Richa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gift Set:
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this seller for the quality of their products and excellent descriptions with photos of what they are selling. I bought this item for a Christmas gift and it is so nice. The wooden basket is so beautiful and the products are perfect for giving or receiving as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not very big... it was a shower ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very big...it was a shower gift and looked really cheesy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Definitely recommend it to any one interested, but not really sure take the risk and purchase it for a love one.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon McNear

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly fresh cucumber
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom's birthday present. The smell wasn't what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

product_meta.title: Wooden Massage and Reflexology Kit for Women: At-Home Spa Kit for All-Over Body Relaxation and Rejuvenation with Fresh Cucumber Melon Aromatherapy Bath and Body Set
feature_bullets: MASSAGE AND REFLEXOLOGY KIT - Enjoy the rejuvenating effects of a full-body massage and reflexology session by yourself or with a partner – and then cool off in the bathtub with an exquisitely refreshing Cucumber-Melon soak.

FULL KIT INCLUDES- 260ml shower gel, 260ml bubble bath, massage comb, reflexology wood stick, loofah, scented candle, and potpourri in an organza bagh Shea Butter and Vitamin E to Moisturize, Soothe, and Soften Skin

RELAX, REJUVENATE AND REVITALIZE YOUR BODY, MIND, AND SOUL. Enjoy the cool and refreshing scent of our Cucumber Melon Essential Oil infused with Shea Butter and Vitamin E, imported from UK, for you to wash away your stress and cares and invigorate your body while working to Moisturize, Nourish, and Protect your Skin with its antioxidant properties.
FREIDA AND JOE QUALITY PROMISE - Made from ingredients sourced from high quality suppliers, fragrance sourced from the United Kingdom for an exquisite spa experience

SPA GIFT BASKETS FOR WOMEN - This bath and body spa gift basket is a perfect beauty basket for women, men & works for any occasion. Full body massage and reflexology kit.. ALL WRAPPED AND READY TO GIVE. Our Collections are Perfect to mark every occasion: Christmas, New Year, Birthday, Wedding, Anniversary, Mother's Day, and Valentine's Day to name a few. It can also be given as a Corporate Giveaway to Honor and Recognize Employees.
